section3.title: 3. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
section3.subtitle: Server Log Files
section3.text:
The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. these are for example:

- Browser type and browser version
- Operating system used
- Referrer URL
- Host name of the accessing computer
- Time of the server request
- IP address

This data is not merged with other data sources.

section4.title: 4. Contact
section4.text:
If you send me inquiries via email or via a contact form, your details including the contact data you provided there will be stored for the purpose of processing the inquiry.

I do not pass on this data without your consent.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.text:
You have the right at any time to:

- Receive information about your stored data
- Demand correction of incorrect data
- Demand deletion of your data
- Demand restriction of processing
- Object to the processing
- Demand data portability

For this purpose, an informal notification via email is sufficient.

section6.title: 6. Right of Complaint
section6.text: You have the right to complain to a competent data protection supervisory authority.

section7.title: 7. SSL or TLS Encryption
section7.text: For security reasons, this site uses SSL or TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from http to https.
